settings.title: Benefits
settings.content:
Silky and fast-absorbing, this cream wraps the skin in lasting moisture and comfort. It delivers multi-layer hydration that draws water in and locks it down, keeping dryness away for hours.

Over time, it reinforces the skin barrier, restoring softness, reducing moisture loss, and improving resilience. Texture looks more refined and even as rough patches fade and dullness is smoothed away. With consistent use, it soothes irritation, supports skin renewal, and leaves the body visibly healthier, balanced, and glowing.

settings.title: How to use
settings.content:
Apply a thin layer to clean, dry skin and gently massage until absorbed. Use all over, from neck to toes, or just where your skin needs extra care. For best results, apply once or twice daily.

Sopele's tip: To make the scent linger, apply a little extra to pulse points: neck, wrists, and décolleté - where warmth naturally releases the fragrance throughout the day.

Strawberry skin & texture
Martina, 26 - Consumer study
I was feeling desperate about red bumps on my legs, but this product made a huge difference after just first few uses. I cannot recommend this scrub enough!

Strawberry skin is caused by clogged pores and keratin buildup, leading to small red or dark bumps, typically on the legs and arms. This scrub gently resurfaces textured skin, clears buildup, and helps smooth and soften rough patches. With consistent use, it visibly reduces bumps and reveals clearer, more even-toned skin.
Ingrown hairs & dark spots
Sanja, 36 - Verified Customer
I was feeling desperate about red bumps on my legs, but this product made a huge difference after just first few uses. I cannot recommend this scrub enough!

Ingrown hairs form when dead skin builds up and traps the hair beneath the surface, often leading to inflammation, bumps, and post-shave marks. Over time, this can leave behind dark spots and uneven tone. This scrub helps by gently exfoliating the skin’s surface, clearing buildup, and supporting healthy cell turnover. The result is smoother skin, fewer ingrowns, and visibly brighter, more even tone over time.
Body acne & uneven skin tone
Dorotea, 26 - Verified Customer
I was feeling desperate about red bumps on my legs, but this product made a huge difference after just first few uses. I cannot recommend this scrub enough!

Breakouts and uneven tone are often caused by clogged pores, excess oil, and buildup that disrupts skin clarity. This scrub helps reduce congestion, calm active blemishes, and gently fade dark marks over time—leaving skin visibly clearer, smoother, and more balanced.

settings.question: How is it different from other body creams?
settings.answer: Designed to meet the standards of advanced facial care, this cream combines clinically inspired ingredients with a deeply comforting texture. It goes beyond surface-level moisturization to support skin renewal, reinforce the barrier, and leave the body feeling smooth, soothed, and resilient - without compromising on sensorial pleasure.

settings.question: Where does Sopele body cream fit into my daily routine?
settings.answer: Use it as the final step in your body care routine, after cleansing and applying serum. It locks in hydration, reinforces the skin barrier, and leaves a soft, silky finish.

settings.question: Can I use it on keratosis pilaris?
settings.answer: Yes. This cream was designed to help with common body skin concerns, including rough texture and clogged follicles. With consistent use, it can help smooth bumps, reduce redness, and improve the overall appearance of areas affected by keratosis pilaris.

settings.question: How is it different from other body scrubs?
Can I layer it with other actives?
settings.answer: Absolutely. The formula was thoughtfully made to play well with others - including exfoliating acids, retinoids, or treatments you might use before. It’s gentle enough to soothe the skin after actives while sealing in hydration and supporting recovery.

settings.question: How long does it take to see results?
settings.answer: Many users notice immediate improvements in softness and comfort after the first application. For visible improvements in skin texture, tone, and resilience, results typically appear within 2 to 4 weeks of consistent daily use, especially when the cream is used daily as part of the whole Sopele body care routine.

settings.question: Is it safe to use during pregnancy?
settings.answer: Yes, the cream is suitable for use during pregnancy. It does not contain retinoids or other ingredients typically restricted during this time. However, if you have any specific concerns, we recommend checking with your healthcare provider.

settings.question: Is it dermatologist tested?
settings.answer: Write a clear and concise answer to guide your customers.

settings.question: Is it vegan and cruelty free?
settings.answer: Yes, this product is 100% vegan and cruelty-free. No animal-derived ingredients are used, and we do not test on animals.

settings.question: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.question: How long will it take to get my orders?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.
